rBackup: Comprehensive R Package Backup and Offline Management System

Source: R/rBackup-package.R
rBackup-package.Rd

A comprehensive backup and offline management system for R packages from multiple sources (GitHub, CRAN, Bioconductor). Unlike installation-only tools, rBackup focuses on creating reliable offline archives, automated backup workflows, and enterprise-grade package management. Features include automated CI/CD integration, compliance reporting, and seamless integration with existing R package management tools.

The rBackup package provides a comprehensive backup and offline management system for R packages from multiple sources (GitHub, CRAN, Bioconductor). Unlike installation-only tools like pak and remotes, rBackup focuses on creating reliable offline archives and automated backup workflows.

Main functions

  • backup_github_packages: Backup GitHub packages

  • backup_cran_packages: Backup CRAN/Bioconductor packages

  • install_from_backup: Install from backups

  • create_local_repo: Create local package repository

  • generate_backup_workflow: Generate automated workflows

Getting started

See vignette("getting-started", package = "rBackup") for an introduction.
